name: adam-perfumes-ecosystem
description: Complete e-commerce ecosystem for Adam-Perfumes with mobile apps, web platform, and backend services

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:mobile && npm run install:web && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:mobile: cd apps/mobile-user-app && npm install && cd ../mobile-admin-app && npm install
scripts.install:web: cd apps/web-user-app && npm install && cd ../web-admin-dashboard && npm install
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build:web-user && npm run build:web-admin
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:web
scripts.test:web: cd apps/web-user-app && npm test && cd ../web-admin-dashboard && npm test

author: Adam-Perfumes Team
